sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Card,CardBody} from "reactstrap" import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city, photo, price,featured, reviews }=tour const totalRating = reviews((acc,item)=>acc+item.rating,0) const avgRating = totalRating === 0 ? '' : totalRating === 1 ? totalRating : totalRating / reviews?.length; return (
{featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating}{" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
Rs.{price}/per person
) } export default TourCard
